Title: Room on the Broom
Writer: Julia Donaldson (based on the book by), Axel Scheffler (based on the book by), Julia Donaldson (adapted by), Max Lang (adapted by)
Actors: Simon Pegg, Gillian Anderson, Rob Brydon, Timothy Spall
Plot: To the annoyance of her cat a kindly witch allows a dog, a bird and a frog who have helped her retrieve things she has lost to ride on her broomstick, making it top heavy. The broom is ...
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 3 nominations.
